A one-time message to establish your identity will be sent to you. Message and data rates may apply. I agree to the BringYour terms. Learn about how we use and protect your data in our Privacy Policy
I agree to the BringYour terms. Learn about how we use and protect your data in our Privacy Policy

BringYour uses a USDC stablecoin self-custody wallet provided by Circle. BringYour can query the balance of the wallet but cannot move any funds out of the wallet. However you, as the owner, can transfer funds out to an exchange or another wallet at any time. Money earned by providing services to the network (in the provide tab) are transferred into your wallet as USDC. We use the Polygon blockchain to minimize transfer fees and maximize compatibility with exchanges.

Your wallet is on the Polygon blockchain. The transfer to address must be on the Polygon blockchain. If you are depositing to an exchange, make sure you select your Polygon USDC wallet address. It is recommended to send a small test amount at first, and then send the rest after confirming the receipt of the test amount.
I understand this is my wallet and BringYour cannot help recover lost funds.
